alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis, southwestern Lake and north central Douglas Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Boulder Lake, to City of Rice Lake, to Proctor, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... French River and Stoney Point around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wisconsin Point, Larsmont, Knife River and Two Harbors. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
